---
title: "set_title"
author: "Tom Naber"
date: "`r format(Sys.Date(), '%B %d, %Y')`"

knit: (function(input, ...) {
  move_script <- here::here("Scripts", "move_output.R");
  output_folder <- here::here("Output");
  rmarkdown::render(input, params = "ask");
  source(move_script);
  move_output(input, output_folder)})
  
output:
  html_document:
    self_contained: true
---
